遅発: (ちはつ) - starting late or behind schedule

遅発性: (ちはつせい) - late-onset (usu. disease, etc.); delayed onset; tardive

遅過ぎる: (あそすぎる) - to be too late; to be too slow
遅達: (ちたつ) - late delivery; delayed delivery; late notification
遇う: (あう) - (逢う is often used for close friends, etc. and may be associated with drama or pathos; 遭う may have an undesirable nuance) to meet/to encounter/to see; (esp. 遭う when in kanji) to have an accident/to have a bad experience
遇する: (ぐうする) - to entertain; to treat
遉: (てい) - Como Era de se Esperar
遊ばす: (あそばす) - to let one play/to leave idle; to do
遊ばせ言葉: (あそばせことば) - polite language used by women
遊び: (asobi) - playing; play (margem entre ligado e desligado, intervalo antes de pressionar o botão ou alavanca tem efeito)
遊びにいく: (あそびにいく) - to go on a trip; to go out to play; to go and visit (a friend)
遊びにくる: (あそびにくる) - to come and stay; to drop in; to visit
遊びに来る: (あそびにくる) - to come and stay; to drop in; to visit
遊びに行く: (あそびにいく) - to go on a trip; to go out to play; to go and visit (a friend)
遊び事: (あそびごと) - game; pastime; recreation; diversion
遊び半分: (あそびはんぶん) - half in fun

遊び呆ける: (あそびほうける) - to spend all of one's time in idle amusement
遊び回る: (あそびまわる) - to jaunt around; to play around; to visit one place after another without effect
遊び心: (あそびごころ) - playfulness; playful mood
遊び戯れる: (あそびたわむれる) - to frolic
遊び暮す: (あそびくらす) - to idle away one's time
遊び暮らす: (あそびくらす) - to idle away one's time
遊び歌: (あそびうた) - action rhymes; song sung (by children) as part of a game
遊び歩く: (あそびあるく) - to visit one place after another without plan or effect; to gallivant about
遊び着: (あそびぎ) - (children's) play clothes/playsuit/rompers; leisurewear/leisure clothes; sports coat/sportswear
遊び言葉: (あそびことば) - filled pause (e.g. um, er, ee-to)
遊ぶ: (asobu) - to play, to enjoy oneself, to have a good time; to mess about (com álcool, jogo, libertinagem, etc.) , to play, to enjoy oneself, to have a good time; to mess about (with alcohol, gambling, philandery, etc.); to be idle, to do nothing, to be unused; to go to (for pleasure or for study)
